Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ineapir 0.2.1

  • Debugged error in the filter argument of the get_metadata values() function.

ineapir 0.2.0

  • Added the function get_metadata_classifications().
  • Added new funcionality to get_metadata_values(): request values hierarchy trees.
  • Added the arguments value, classification, hierarchy and filter to get_metadata_values().

ineapir 0.1.0

  • Added the arguments dateStart y dateEnd to get_data_table() and allow multiple range of dates.
  • New filter funcionality: if a minus sign id added to a value, the value will be excluded from the filter.
  • Added the argument detto get_metadata_table_varval().
  • Added the argument detto get_metadata_variables().

ineapir 0.0.0.9000

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
